subtitle: Developer, project manager, analyst and DevOps

about_me.title: About me
about_me.paragraph_1: My name is Thomas Vanderhaeghen and specialise in PHP development. In my 11 years as a professional developer I also picked up skills in React (typescript), devops and project management.
about_me.paragraph_2: I believe that alone or together with your team my experience and skill can make a difference in your company.
about_me.paragraph_3: While developing help is always welcome, either building a good foundation for new applications or improving on already existing applications. Either way I will work hard to set you up for success.

skills.title: Skills
skills.php: Using PHP since 2004 (5.0 until 8.1) together with frameworks and libraries like symfony, laravel, codeigniter, doctrine and propel.
skills.react: In the last years frontend development started to play a bigger role, starting out with angular2 later moved on to react. This website is created with NuXT (vue.js).
skills.docker: Docker has been my primary setup for local development. Expanded into kubernetes for production and test servers.
skills.aws: When doing devops my go-to is mostly AWS services. Cloudformation, Cloudfront, Beanstalk, EC2, S3, Simple Search, SES, ElastiCache, IAM, Certificate manager.

experience.title: References
experience.2011: Made-to-measure application to improve efficiency within the company. PHP Developer.
experience.2013: iController.eu. Application for credit control and management. Where I first came into contact with Agile and project management. PHP Developer.
experience.2015: Diligentia uitgeverij. Digital courses and school management. PHP Developer.
experience.2018: Optios. Salon management software, online booking, register and marketing. Lead developer.

footer: Design inspired by The washington post front page.
